ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))
If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusAPRV || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusCLSD,
    DisplayMode.Disabled,
    DisplayMode.Edit
)

LookUp(
    Filter(
        fStatuses,
        TableName = "PurchaseOrders"
    ),
    StatusID = Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ),
    StatusName
)

Filter(
    [
        "Cash",
        "Check",
        "Credit Card"
    ],
    LookUp(
        fPurchaseOrders,
        PurchaseOrderID = gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID,
        PaymentMethod
    )
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

Filter(
    fCompanies,
    CompanyID = LookUp(
        fPurchaseOrders,
        PurchaseOrderID = gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID,
        VendorID
    )
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

Filter(
    fSubmitters,
    EmployeeID = LookUp(
        fPurchaseOrders,
        PurchaseOrderID = gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID,
        SubmittedByID
    )
)

Text(
    LookUp(
        fSystemSettings,
        SettingID = fMagicNo.gvDefaultNWTaxRate,
        SettingValue
    ) * Sum(
        glryPOLineItemsEditAdd.AllItems,
        UnitCost * Quantity
    ) ,
    "$#,##0.00"
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

Text(
    Sum(
        glryPOLineItemsEditAdd.AllItems,
        UnitCost * Quantity
    ) + gvCRUDPO.TaxAmount + gvCRUDPO.ShippingFee,
    "$#,##0.00"
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

Filter(
    fApprovers,
    EmployeeID = LookUp(
        fPurchaseOrders,
        PurchaseOrderID = gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID,
        ApprovedByID
    )
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusSBM || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

If(
    Coalesce(
        gvCRUDPO.StatusID,
        fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW
    ) = fMagicNo.gvPOStatusNEW || gvCRUDPO.PurchaseOrderID = 0,
    DisplayMode.Edit,
    DisplayMode.Disabled
)

Text(
    Coalesce(
        ThisItem.UnitCost,
        LookUp(
            fProducts,
            ProductID = Coalesce(
                gvCRUDProductID,
                0
            ),
            StandardUnitCost
        ),
        0
    ),
    "$#,##0.00"
)
